name: setbot
description:
change bot status, this will reset bot activity

Argument
`{status}` : `online`, `offline`, `idle`, `dnd`, `invisible`

name: activity
description:
change bot activity. 

Argument
`{activity}` : `playing`, `listening`, `watching`
`{name}` : activity name

name: say
description:
Send message to specific channel

Argument 
`{channel}` : channel mention
`{message}` : Your message

name: disable
description:
Disable command on the current channel

Argument 
`{command}` : command

name: enable
description:
Disable command on the current channel

Argument 
`{command}` : command

name: tagadd
description:
add a new tags with 2 step, 
enter the tag's name and the tag's description

name: tagremove
description:
remove tag

Argument 
`{name}` : name of tag, use `taglist` command for check all tags

name: run
description:
Run automatic direct message to new members

*Requires confirmation by reaction:*

name: stop
description: Stop automatic direct message to new members

name: change
description:
Change the message

*Requires confirmation by reaction:* 
Argument
`{content}` : Your content message

name: show
description: Displays messages to be sent to new members

name: reply
description:
Send and hold user with {user id} for reply DM channel

*This command only can be use on DM channel by owner*
Argument :
`{user id}` : Discord user id

name: exit
description:
Exit from `reply` command

 this command only can be use on DM channel by owner

name: artifact
description:
Displays artifact details

Argument 
`{name}` : artefact names, minimal 4 characters

name: weapon
description:
Displays weapon details

Argument 
`{name}` : weapon names, minimal 4 characters

name: avatar
description:
show avatar's user by mention

Argument 
`{mention}` : mention user or blank

name: calc
description:
Answer math questions 

Argument 
`{q}` : example `1+1`

name: help
description:
Displays help details

Argument 
`{name}` : command

name: tag
description:
show content of tag, 

Argument 
`{name}` : name of tag, use `taglist` command for check all tags

name: taglist
description: show all tags
